discussion.p: I have one issue with std::pair. Well, it might just be a very annoying historical accident, but why is there no default template argument for the second template argument? This is so annoying when the type in question is looong and hard to write (type deduction with auto won't help those cases where we use it as a return or argument type).

resolution.p: Change the synopsis in to read:

blockquote.pre: template <class T1, class T2 = T1> struct pair;
